intro: Manulea derustiana, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to eastern Africa. The plant produces showy, tubular flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white, often with a contrasting throat. Its leaves are typically velvety and heart-shaped, adding to its ornamental appeal. Manulea derustiana is popular as a houseplant due to its ability to thrive in indoor conditions with proper care.
